name: QuikVote
description: Struggling to decide what to do with friends? Whether it’s picking a restaurant, movie, or activity, **QuikVote** makes group decisions fast and fair. Simply create a vote room, share it, and let everyone vote simultaneously. Don’t like the options? Add a new one in seconds! Once the votes are in, the results are clear, and you can get on with your plans. Make decisions effortlessly with **QuikVote**—the quick, easy solution to group indecision!
